mapper.insert: insert into T_DATA_DICT (ID, ITEM_NAME, COL_NAME_CN, COL_NAME, ITEM_VAL, ITEM_DESC, SPARE1,ITEM_TYPE,STATUS,HANDLE_STATUS,CREATE_USER_NAME ) values (#{id}, #{itemName}, #{colNameCn}, #{colName},#{itemVal}, #{itemDesc}, #{spare1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{itemType},#{status},#{handleStatus},#{createUserName} )
mapper.update: update T_DATA_DICT set ITEM_NAME = #{itemName}, COL_NAME_CN = #{colNameCn}, COL_NAME = #{colName}, ITEM_VAL = #{itemVal}, ITEM_TYPE = #{itemType}, ITEM_DESC = #{itemDesc}, SPARE1 = #{spare1}, LAST_UPD_TIME = SYSDATE WHERE ID=#{id}
